turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, yeah. I'm trying to make an order at Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. I would like a short caramel macchiato.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: with non-fat milk and no cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, which location would you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Olympic and Olive in Los Angeles.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: one moment while i send that order to that location.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i have ordered you a short caramel macchiato with non-fat milk to be picked up at the starbucks on olympic and olive.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you and your order will be ready in 5 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's it. Have a good day.
